articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Construction Sites of Huichon Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Construction Sites of Huichon Power Station
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the construction site of the Ryongrim Dam of Huichon Power Station No. 1.
					
					 After being briefed on the construction before a huge design for building the power station, he went round the construction sites to learn in detail about the progress of the project.
					
					 Watching the gigantic construction sites reminiscent of big battle sites, he said that a giant structure began to spring up in the secluded Ryongrim ravine in a matter of a few months. He expressed great satisfaction with the rapid progress made in the construction of the power station. 
					
					 Thanks to the heroic drive of the soldier-builders a huge dam of Huichon Power Station No. 1 will tower and there will appear a large man-made reservoir before long, he noted, calling upon them to wage a bold charge to bring earlier the day of victory.  
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the construction site of the dam of Huichon Power Station No. 2.
					
					 After being briefed on the construction before a big map showing the panoramic view of the power station, he looked round the construction site of the dam to acquaint himself with the progress made in the project.
					
					 Watching the dam rise against the time, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the soldier-builders have registered signal successes in the dam project by actively introducing efficient work methods and waging a three dimensional drive. He highly appreciated their feats.
					
					 We can successfully undertake any epoch-making huge nature-harnessing project as we determined to do as we have the heroic soldiers intensely loyal to the Party and the revolution, he said, adding: This is wealth and prosperity which our Party and people alone can enjoy.
					
					 Noting that every minute and second in the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station witness a leaping advance and innovation and world-startling miracles are being wrought without let-up in the crucible of this high-pitched drive, he said with pride that this great speed precisely means a new Chollima speed, "Huichon speed" based on the revolutionary soldier spirit, the basis of the Songun politics.
					
					 After making the rounds of the construction sites, he put forth on the spot highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for completing the construction of the Huichon Power Station ahead of schedule.
					
					 He said that it is the top priority task for building a thriving nation to satisfactorily settle the shortage of electricity.
					
					 He stressed that in order to complete the construction of the power station before 2012 it is necessary to launch a great offensive with the whole Party and army and all the people involved. 
					
					 He expressed conviction that the builders of the power station would unconditionally complete the Huichon Power Station till 2012 by displaying popular heroism and matchless devotion and thus live up to the Party's trust and expectation with shining feats.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army, Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Chinese Envoy Places Wreath before Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Chinese Envoy Places Wreath before Friendship Tower
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- State Councilor of the People's Republic of China Dai Bingguo who is special envoy of Hu Jintao, President of the People's Republic of China, and his party on a visit to the DPRK laid a wreath before the Friendship Tower Thursday. 
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 The honor guards of the Korean People's Army were seen standing there. 
					
					 Amidst wreath-laying music a wreath in the name of the special envoy was laid there. 
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers who bravely fought on the Korean front and went round the tower.
					
					 The special envoy made an entry in the visitors' book.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets LPRP Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets LPRP Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party led by Asang Laoly, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairman of the Control Commission of its Central Committee who is vice-prime minister and president of the State Inspection Commission of Laos, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
					 The head of the delegation asked Kim Yong Nam to convey greetings sent to General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il by President of Laos Choummaly Saynasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam expressed deep thanks for this and asked the head of the delegation to convey the greetings sent by Kim Jong Il to Choummaly Saynasone.
					
					 The head of the delegation said that during the visit to the DPRK, he was deeply impressed to see the Korean people accelerating the building of a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the two parties and the two countries have made positive efforts to strengthen and develop the friendly and cooperative relations between Laos and the DPRK provided by Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He stressed that the party, the government and the people of Laos would support the just cause of the party, the government and the people of the DPRK for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in the future, too.
					
					 Present there were Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, officials concerned and Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from LPRP Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from LPRP Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by head of the delegation Asang Laoly, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairman of the Control Commission of its Central Committee who is vice-prime minister and president of the State Inspection Commission of Laos, on Thursday.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Laos-Korea Friendship Association Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Laos-Korea Friendship Association Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday met and had a talk with the delegation of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association led by Vice-Chairman Khamphanh Sitthidampha, who is secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Laos-Korea Friendship Association Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Laos-Korea Friendship Association Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Laos-Korea Friendship Association.
					 It was conveyed by Khamphanh Sitthidampha, vice-chairman of the association who is secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union on a visit to the DPRK, to an official concerned.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of foreign affairs officials of the Chinese People's Liberation Army led by Major General Qian Lihua, director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, arrived here Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Remembered
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Remembered 
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Remembrance stage "Mother Is Always with Red Flag" was given by workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) at the Central Hall of Workers on Thursday to remember Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, on the 60th anniversary of her demise.
					 Kim Pyong Phal, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK who mounted the stage, said that short as the life of Kim Jong Suk was, her noble revolutionary spirit, lofty personality and immortal exploits serve as the everlasting example of life and struggle of workers and members of the GFTU of the DPRK. 
					
					 Ri Yong Suk, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter who mounted the stage, recollected that Kim Jong Suk provided noble tradition of devotedly defending the leader and gave birth to General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the days of hard-fought anti-Japanese struggle, thus guaranteeing the brilliant future of Korea.
					
					 Min Sun who had connection with her revolutionary activities talked about the revolutionary moral obligation of Kim Jong Suk who looked after with warm loving care the bereaved children of revolutionary martyrs, holding them in her broad embrace and always shared weal and woe with people with peculiar simplicity and assiduity. 
					
					Kim Il Nam, chairman of the primary organization of the GFTUK of the Kangnam Ceramic Factory, Kim Yong Ok, worker of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, and Ri Kun Sok, vice-chairman of the primary organization of the GFTUK of the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, stressed that
						 Kim Jong Suk is always with the red flag and encourages all the servicepersons and people to the sacred struggle for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Put on the stage were such items as male solo and female pangchang "My Mother", a famous classic masterpiece, and male quartet "Mother Is Always with Red Flag" which praise Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Lauded by All People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Lauded by All People
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk has been praised highly as a great revolutionary and peerless patriot by all people generation after generation for her undying feats performed for the times and revolution, the country and people.
					 The people remember her down through generations, because she had made great exploits within a span of 32 years that others could not do even in a century.
					
					 It is her greatest exploit that she established the tradition of defending the leader with very lives and gave birth to the Bright Star of Mt. Paektu and brought him up to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Uncountable are her feats. She displayed indomitable heroic stamina and rendered distinguished military services in the battles with the Japanese imperialists and strengthened the ideological and purposeful unity of the revolutionary ranks through experienced political activities and energetic underground work.
					
					 In order to hand down her achievements to the posterity, the Korean people and the world progressives named units and organizations after her and conferred orders, medals and honorary titles on her with boundless reverence for her.
					
					 Lots of units across the country were termed after her august name including Kim Jong Suk County, Kim Jong Suk Teacher Training College, Kim Jong Suk Rest Home and Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill.
					
					 A kindergarten in Suhbaatar District, Ulan Bator City of Mongolia was named "Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten" in Juche 88 (1999). Recent years witnessed that many organizations and units in various countries have been given her name one after another, including the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk and the Russian Women's Union in the Title of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The Korean people awarded the title of Hero of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to her in September of Juche 61 (1972).
					
					 The "Contribution to Victory" Organizing Committee of the International Commemoration Movement of Russia presented to her a social order "Contribution to the Victory", the National Association of Writers and Artists of Peru a great medal "Sun of the National Association of Writers and Artists of Peru" and the League of Experts for Egyptian Cultural and International Civilization Dialogue a prize and a certificate praising her exploits. And Ecuador, Mongolia, France and other countries conferred on her orders, medals and certificates of honorary title.
					
					 The Tumbes City Council of Peru, beyond its usage of awarding certificates of honorary citizenship only to world prominent state leaders and famous figures, newly instituted a world honorary citizenship certificate to confer on her on the occasion of her 80th birth anniversary.
					
					 On the occasion of her birth anniversary every year various countries organized preparatory committees, mass media widely introduced her life and revolutionary achievements and India, Syria and other countries created lots of memorial books, words of songs and others.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk is alive in the minds of the Korean people and humankind, enjoying their reverence.

articles.title: National Hygienic Propaganda Contest Held
articles.content:
National Hygienic Propaganda Contest Held
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A national contest of hygienic propaganda teams of health officials took place in Anju City, South Phyongan Province from Sept. 15 to 17.
					 Participating in the contest were at least 200 members of the hygienic propaganda teams selected in provincial, city and county contests.
					
					 The participants showed well the artistry they have trained in the course of briskly conducting hygienic propaganda activities in factories, enterprises and construction sites.
					
					 The groups of Pyongyang City, South Hamgyong Province and South Phyongan Province were highly appreciated at the contest.

articles.title: National Angling Contest Held
articles.content:
National Angling Contest Held
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A national angling contest was held on the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang on Sept. 17.
					 More than 60 angling fans selected in provinces, ministries and national institutions competed in the contest. They were allowed to use up to four sets of fishing tackles including pole and line, mechanical pole and line and hook and line.
					
					 As soon as the contest started, the contestants cast the river.
					
					 When floats moved up and down the surface of water and the bell tinkled, they fished up continuously goldfishes, bitterlings and other fishes with skilled movements. 
					
					 At the contest, prizes were awarded to those who caught many fishes by employing tactful angling methods.
					
					 An exhibition of newly invented angling tackles took place on the same day.

articles.title: World First Aid Day Marked
articles.content:
World First Aid Day Marked
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A function took place in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province Thursday on the occasion of World First Aid Day. 
					Present there were officials and members of the DPRK Red Cross Society and members of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies active in the DPRK. 
					
					 The participants watched the first aid contest staged by young RC members of the province at Okjon Secondary School in the city. 
					
					 They enjoyed music and dance pieces given by the members and talked with each other about Red Cross activities. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the dissemination of knowledge on first aid for students was given at the training centre of the South Phyongan Provincial Red Cross Branch.

articles.title: North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theater
articles.content:
North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theater
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A new art theater has been built in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province to give a great joy to the people of the province.
					 The theater, with a total floor space of over 15,000 square meters and a seating capacity of more than 900, has an auditorium, stage, modern sound and illumination facilities, makeup rooms, instrumental, vocal, dance and narration training rooms and other conditions needed for artistic creation, performance and appreciation.
					
					 The central hall fascinates the visitors for the radiantly shining ceiling chandeliers and side-wall decorations which form an artistic harmony. Described on its frontal wall are Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia, flowers of the Sun. 
					
					 The two-storeyed auditorium was arranged to fully meet the requirement and convenience of the audience.
					
					 The chairs of the auditorium are peculiar, the walls are dressed with sound absorption boards to give stereophonic space and the air conditioning system on the ceiling makes the audience see performance without feeling lassitude.
					
					 The sound-mixing console room and illumination control room are also furnished in a modern way in accordance with the requirement of the new century.
					
					 The sound-mixing console room ensures the sound on a high level so that the vocal artists can sing songs to suit individual characteristics and the stage is also arranged for successful performance.
					
					 With the construction of the provincial art theatre, centre for cultural and emotional life, which satisfies the requirements of the modern aesthetic sense and architecture, the inhabitants of the province can enjoy to their hearts' content the happy life as the creator and enjoyer of the socialist culture in the Songun era.

articles.title: Room for Disseminating German Scientific and Technological Books
articles.content:
Room for Disseminating German Scientific and Technological Books
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A room for disseminating German scientific and technological books is under operation at the Chollima Hall of Culture of the DPRK.
					 The room, opened to the public in June of Juche 93 (2004), has been visited by scientists, researchers, students and foreigners.
					
					 They read books on natural science and social science including history and literature in the room. 
					
					 It with many books was supplemented by scientific and technological books of more than 280 kinds in March of this year to draw the interests of the readers.

articles.title: Week of DPRK Film Show Held in China
articles.content:
Week of DPRK Film Show Held in China
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK films were shown before full houses in China on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and China. 
					 A ceremony for opening the week of the DPRK film show took place at the New Century Cinema in Beijing on Sept. 11.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were the vice-director of the State Administration of Radio, Film and TV of China, officials in the filmdom and masses. 
					
					 Present there were the delegation of DPRK film workers led by the vice-chairman of the State Film Commission on a visit to China, the DPRK ambassador to China and his embassy officials.
					
					 The vice-director of the State Administration of Radio, Film and TV of China and the head of the delegation of DPRK film workers made speeches at the opening ceremony.
					
					 The speakers expressed belief that the week of the film show would help increase the understanding of the DPRK among new generations and inject fresh vitality into further boosting the traditional friendship between the two countries in the new century. And they vowed to continue to develop the cooperation in the field of film-making amid the concern of the top leaders of the two countries. 
					
					 Then, the participants watched the DPRK film "The Flower Girl".
					
					 "A Bellflower", "A Schoolgirl's Diary", "The Country I Saw" and other DPRK films were screened in the period of the week of the film show that ended on Sept. 15.
					
					 The places of the film shows were overcrowded with audience who hardly repressed their excitement.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked 
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Seminars of organizations for the study of the Juche idea were held in Colombia, Sweden, Bulgaria, Britain and Nigeria and film shows in Russia, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar and Germany from Sept. 4 to 9 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, said that the DPRK has dynamically pushed ahead with the socialist cause, guided by the Juche idea, the Songun idea, since the very day of its foundation.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that the history of the DPRK, which has won victories overcoming all sorts of trials depending upon the united strength of the leader, the party and the masses, proves the validity and vitality of the Juche idea.
					
					 Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the DPRK is the publicly recognized political and ideological power and military power. 
					
					 Shawn Pikford, secretary general of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, pointed out that the three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural, are being dynamically pushed ahead in the DPRK and shining successes have been achieved on all the fronts of socialist construction.
					
					Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, said that the DPRK has victoriously advanced and fully demonstrated its might in the international arena under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, and General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il for the last more than six decades since its foundation.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films including "For the Liberation of the Country", "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "The Army of the DPRK".
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in Sweden.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Denmark
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Denmark
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A Danish preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Copenhagen on September 12. 
					 The ceremony elected Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, chairman of the above-said committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows for widely introducing feats of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and other diverse events till April of 2012.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju se reune con Dai Bingguo
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju se reune con Dai Bingguo
 Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Se efectuo el dia 16 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae el intercambio de opiniones entre Kang Sok Ju, primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y Dai Bingguo, enviado especial del presidente de la Republica Popular China Hu Jintao y consejero de Estado.
					 En esta ocasion participaron por la parte coreana el vicecanciller Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios y por la china la comitiva del enviado especial y el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming.
					
					  Ambas partes intercambiaron en el ambiente camaraderil las opiniones sinceras y profundas sobre el problema de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad Corea-China y otros asuntos regionales e internacionales.

articles.title: En Pyongyang enviado especial de Hu Jintao
articles.content:
En Pyongyang enviado especial de Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El consejero de Estado, Dai Bingguo, enviado especial del presidente de la Republica Popular China Hu Jintao llego el dia 16 por via aerea a esta capital.
					Le acompanaron el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Wu Dawei, el viceministro de Comercio Fu Ziying, el subdirector de la Oficina Central de los Asuntos Exteriores Qiu Yuanping, el asistente del jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China Guo Yezhou.
					
					Los huespedes chinos fueron acogidos por el vicecanciller coreano Kim Yong Il y el embajador chino en Corea Liu Xiaoming.

articles.title: Gobierno coreano ofrece banquete en honor de enviado especial de China
articles.content:
Gobierno coreano ofrece banquete en honor de enviado especial de China
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 16 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae el banquete en honor del enviado especial del presidente de la Republica Popular China Hu Jintao, de visita en Corea.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el enviado especial Dai Bingguo, consejero de Estado y su comitiva, asi como el embajador chino Liu Xiaoming, acreditado en Corea.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju, el vicecanciller Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios coreanos.

articles.title: Dai Bingguo presencia funcion gimnastico-artistica "Arirang"
articles.content:
Dai Bingguo presencia funcion gimnastico-artistica "Arirang"
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El consejero de Estado Dai Bingguo, enviado especial del presidente de la Republica Popular China, Hu Jintao, y su comitiva, de visita en Corea, presenciaron el dia 16 en el Estadio Primero de Mayo la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang".
					La vieron tambien el vicecanciller Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios coreanos, trabajadores capitalinos y el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming.

articles.title: Dai Bingguo deposita ofrenda floral ante el Monumento a la Amistad
articles.content:
Dai Bingguo deposita ofrenda floral ante el Monumento a la Amistad
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El consejero de Estado Dai Bingguo, enviado especial del presidente de la Republica Popular China Hu Jintao y su comitiva, de visita en Corea, depositaron el dia 17 una ofrenda floral ante el Monumento a la Amistad.
					En la ocasion participaron el vicecanciller coreano Kim Yong Il y el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming.
					
					En el mismo lugar estaban puestos los guardias de honor del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Mientras se interpretaba la musica de la ocasion fue depositada la ofrenda floral a nombre del enviado especial ante el monumento.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria a los martires del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino quienes lucharon valientemente en el frente coreano, y recorrieron el monumento.
					
					El enviado especial dejo inscripciones en el libro de impresiones.

articles.title: Corea: actividades dedicadas al "Dia Mundial de Cura Urgente"
articles.content:
Corea: actividades dedicadas al "Dia Mundial de Cura Urgente"
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en la ciudad de Phyongsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur una actividad dedicada al "Dia Mundial de Cura Urgente".
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios y los miembros de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los miembros de la delegacion de la Liga Internacional de la Cruz Roja y Medialuna Roja que trabajan en Corea.
					
					Los participantes presenciaron en la Escuela Secundaria de Okjon de la ciudad de Phyongsong el juego de los miembros de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de los Jovenes y Ninos de dicha provincia, relacionado con la cura de primera intencion.
					
					Luego, ellos vieron la funcion artistica de los miembros de la susodicha asociacion y charlaron con estos sobre las actividades de la cruz roja.
					
					El mismo dia, en el centro de formacion de la sucursal de cruz roja en dicha provincia se desarrollo la labor de divulgacion del conocimiento de cura urgente para los estudiantes.
